QuestData.Title: Enchanted Lock
QuestData.Description:
<The lock appears to be secured by a magical mechanism.
It is clearly one of Mardivas', and from what you can surmise from reading the journals, it is likely locked via an arcane puzzle.
You look around the room, and see something odd in the water.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Solve Mardivas' arcane puzzle to unlock the enchanted lock.

Objectives.Objective: Match 3 purple runes to unlock the lock
